timeline.bodyText: Now we already have threads named pulsar-client-io, so it's better to use a different name for the new threads. And I noticed some internal tasks of the client also uses the externalExecutorProvider for executing the internal task of the Pulsar client. Maybe we can add an internalExecutorService for handing the internal tasks of the client.
